attributes.action: To arrange asylum deals for UK citizens who wish to claim asylum abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the prime minister to develop a system to aid in the applications of UK citizens for asylum abroad.

For all the citizens who do not wish to have civil liberties eroded and live in a police state. They should be allowed to claim asylum in countries like Australia, Canada, and New Zealand. The government should transfer monies collected from taxes and National Insurance and pension funds to assit their new Country care for their new free citizens.
